title: TextGenerationV1
description: Universal schema for text generation responses across Lumen VLM services. Returns generated text with metadata about the generation process.

generated_tokens.description: Number of tokens generated in the response

input_tokens.description: Number of tokens in the input prompt

model_id.description: Identifier of the model that generated the text

top_p.description: Nucleus sampling parameter used for generation

seed.description: Random seed used for generation (if deterministic)

generation_time_ms.description: Time taken to generate the response in milliseconds

streaming_chunks.description: Number of chunks in streaming generation (if applicable)

metadata.description: Optional metadata about the generation process

examples.text: The image shows a beautiful sunset over mountains with vibrant colors.
A cat is sitting on a windowsill looking outside.
